sen.j: 朽木 倫綱（くつき ともつな）は、丹波国福知山藩の第9代藩主。
sen.e: Tomotsuna KUTSUKI was the ninth lord of Fukuchiyama domain in Tanba Province.
Tomotsuna KUTSUKI was the ninth lord of the Fukuchiyama Domain in Tanba Province.
Tomotsuna KUTSUKI was the ninth lord of the Fukuchiyama Domain in Tanba Province.
The tenth load of the Kutsuki family in Fukuchiyama domain.
The tenth head of the Kutsuki family in the Fukuchiyama Domain.
sen.cmt: load→headに修正、the Fukuchiyama Domainとしました。
sen.e: The tenth head of the Kutsuki family in the Fukuchiyama Domain.

sen.j: 明和4年（1767年）1月7日、第7代藩主・朽木舖綱の長男として生まれる。
sen.e: Born on January 7, 1767 as the first son of Nobutsuna KUTSUKI, the seventh lord of the domain.
He was born on February 5, 1767 as the first son of Nobutsuna KUTSUKI, the seventh lord of the Domain.
sen.cmt: 旧暦→新暦に修正、He was born、the Domainとしました。
sen.e: He was born on February 5, 1767 as the first son of Nobutsuna KUTSUKI, the seventh lord of the Domain.

sen.j: 寛政12年（1800年）4月9日、第8代藩主の朽木昌綱が隠居したため、家督を継いで第9代藩主となる。
sen.e: When Masatsuna KUTSUKI, the eighth lord of the domain, retired on April 9, 1800, he took over as head of the family and became the ninth lord of the domain.
When Masatsuna KUTSUKI, the eighth lord of the Domain, retired on May 2, 1800, he took over as head of the family and became the ninth lord of the Domain.
sen.cmt: 旧暦→新暦に修正、the Domainとしました。
sen.e: When Masatsuna KUTSUKI, the eighth lord of the Domain, retired on May 2, 1800, he took over as head of the family and became the ninth lord of the Domain.

sen.j: 10月4日には奏者番に任じられるなど、将来を早くから嘱望されるほど有能だった。
sen.e: He was brilliant and people expected a lot from him, and he was even appointed as sojaban (an official in charge of the ceremonies) on October 4.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: He was brilliant and people expected a lot from him, and he was even appointed as sojaban (an official in charge of the ceremonies) on November 20.
He was brilliant and people expected a lot from him, and he was even appointed as sojaban (an official in charge of the ceremonies) on November 20.

sen.j: しかし、養父の後を追うように享和2年（1802年）12月20日に死去した。
sen.e: However, he died on December 20, 1802, as if he followed his foster father.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: However, he died on January 13, 1803, as if he followed his foster father.
However, he died on January 13, 1803, as if he followed his foster father.
Died at the age of 36.
Died at the age of 36.
Died at the age of 36.

sen.j: 後を養子の朽木綱方が継いだ。
sen.e: His adopted son Tsunakata KUTSUKI succeeded him.
His adopted son Tsunakata KUTSUKI succeeded him.
His adopted son Tsunakata KUTSUKI succeeded him.
